alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 8:46AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens and southwestern Union Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 846 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Laurens, or near Waterloo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Joanna, Cross Hill, Waterloo, Rose Hill State Park, Lake Greenwood, Mountville, Sedalia and Kinards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
